body.value: <font color="lightgrey">And it's an attempt to capture, not-- maybe not one era, but a series of eras. And Nina Simone seems to be present throughout. She seems now to have been a constant. And the poem is a sense of our-- of a kind of communal regret, personalized, where the speaker takes on the confessional attitude of the group, of the community, of the 'We'.</font>
